channel.title: Comments on: Follow Up with the Heart Guy – Tuesday, September 5, 2017

item.title: By: suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-184">Wendy Kilpatrick</a>.
Thank you, Wendy and Susan! I will definitely pass along your message! :)

item.title: By: suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-189">Betsy Engelken</a>.
Hi Betsy!
I'm so sorry for not replying sooner! I am sure she would LOVE a birthday card! The address is 42636 Emperor Drive, Ashburn VA 20148. Thank you for thinking of her and keeping up with her!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Betsy Engelken.

Hi Betsy!

I’m so sorry for not replying sooner! I am sure she would LOVE a birthday card! The address is 42636 Emperor Drive, Ashburn VA 20148. Thank you for thinking of her and keeping up with her!

item.title: By: Betsy Engelken
item.dc:creator: Betsy Engelken
item.description: Would love to send Suk a birthday card. Could you send along your address? Thanks so much.
item.content:encoded: Would love to send Suk a birthday card. Could you send along your address? Thanks so much.

item.title: By: Wendy Kilpatrick
item.dc:creator: Wendy Kilpatrick
item.description: Hi, we are Wendy and Susan Montanari and we want you to let Sue B know that we are right behind her, pulling for her-- Sending hugs from both of us! Abd thank you for keeping us in the loop!
item.content:encoded: Hi, we are Wendy and Susan Montanari and we want you to let Sue B know that we are right behind her, pulling for her– Sending hugs from both of us! Abd thank you for keeping us in the loop!
